articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Bumrah Shandaar...': AB de Villiers' special Hindi message for newly-crowned world no.1 Test bowler - Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: Former South African skipper AB de Villiers praises Jasprit Bumrah for his outstanding bowling performance in the second Test against England, where he became the first Indian pacer to be ranked No.1 in the ICC Test bowlers' rankings.
articles.content: India vs England: Bumrah, Bazball and spin
